name: Nicky Doll
description:
'''Karl Sanchez''' (born 14 March 1991), known by the stage name '''Nicky Doll''', is a French [[drag queen]], television personality, and musician based in [[New York City]]. He is best known as the main host of ''[[Drag Race France]]'' and a competitor on the [[RuPaul's Drag Race season 12|twelfth season]] of ''[[RuPaul's Drag Race]]''.

Sanchez co-created, co-wrote, and stars in ''[[Les Voyages de Nicky]]'', a documentary that explores gender expression, the art of drag, and [[LGBT activism]] in different countries.
